definition: multicolored splendor (of fireworks, bright lights etc)

sentences.english: We continued our select coastal journey in Fujian, which boasts scenic beauty and a brilliant cultural tradition.
sentences.chinese: 我們在風光秀美，文化燦爛的福建繼續海疆精華之旅。

sentences.english: The Tourney of Talent is about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 星光燦爛的比賽馬上就要開始了。

sentences.english: Will the love affair between he and Ming Hui be fruitful?
sentences.chinese: 他與明慧的愛情能結出燦爛的果實嗎？

sentences.english: It is the terms of the earth that kept her smiles in bloom .
sentences.chinese: 大地的淚珠，使她的微笑如花一般燦爛不謝。

sentences.english: On a sunny northern coast, there are wonderful activities throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 在陽光燦爛的蔚藍海岸，全年都有精彩活動。

sentences.english: He created the Persian Empire, one of the most splendid the world has ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 他建立了一個當時世界史上空前輝煌燦爛的波斯帝國。

sentences.english: We wish Nantong Zhanyang Fiber Co. , Ltd a promising future on the land of Haimen.
sentences.chinese: 我們預祝展陽公司在海門大地上展現陽光燦爛的前景。

sentences.english: You look best in bright red lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 你用燦爛的赤色脣膏看起來最好。

sentences.english: Joint endeavor to build you to my brilliant "Stone in the" Tomorrow effort.
sentences.chinese: 共鑄您我輝煌燦爛的“石在”明天努力。

sentences.english: From the outside, everything looks splendid.
sentences.chinese: 從表面看，一切看起來很燦爛。

sentences.english: Direct access to the full glory of a new era.
sentences.chinese: 直達光輝燦爛的新紀元。

sentences.english: Like your character, like jumping lively and brilliant, like candy, as the spring breeze.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡你的性格，就像跳跳糖一樣活潑燦爛，一如春風。

sentences.english: When the sun is bright, the whole room is in a perfect blaze of splendor, as its windows are mainly east.
sentences.chinese: 陽光燦爛是整個房間四壁皆輝，因爲窗戶大多朝東。

sentences.english: Let the sky lanterns shine, to illuminate the future, shine with great splendor, blessing the world.
sentences.chinese: 讓天燈普照大地，照亮未來，光輝燦爛，降福人間。

sentences.english: This is a star-spangled day, deserving of a gold star on your calendar.
sentences.chinese: 這是個星光燦爛的子，值得在歷上畫一個大金星。

sentences.english: That yellow middle gave it an especially sunny look during the day.
sentences.chinese: 白天，中間黃色的部分讓它的外形格外陽光燦爛。

definition: to illuminate/to turn on the lights/to light (a blaze)
